dct_title_s: Schetse van de bergen Sinai en Horeb
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows topography, vegetation, settlement, places of historical interest.
Features illustrations of men in foreground.
Appears in Calmet's Het algemeen groot historich, oordeelkundig ... Leiden, Samuel Luchtmans, 1727, vol. 2.
